XenotypeDef.label: Haseldan
XenotypeDef.description: Haseldans are a hardy race from another world, oppressed for years and capable of withstanding significant hardship. Due to the loss of magic and tithe in this world, the only thing available to them of their genetic abilities is an unbreakable will and the grit to fight when all seems lost.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Haseldans are a hardy race. They're capable of withstanding pain and stress, and continue fighting.

XenotypeDef.label: Ashiin
XenotypeDef.description: Ashiins are a warrior race from another world, born and raised as fighters. despite the lack of the Ashiin's traditional training in this world, their burning fire for all things related to physical violence and their genetic strength stays.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Ashiins are a warrior race, with strong melee abilities.

XenotypeDef.label: Castellan
XenotypeDef.description: Castellans are a scholar race from another world, capable of great feats of magic and smart enough to memorize magic others would find impossible. however, being disconnected from tithe has reduced their abilities to their insatiable lust for learning, and excellent educational abilities.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Castellans are a scholar race, who can learn quickly and research well.

XenotypeDef.label: Construct
XenotypeDef.description: Constructs are an artifical race from another world, highly resistant to all forms of chemical-based drugs and toxicity, even disease and sickness. due to the genetic engineering from their creation deep in a tundra, they are also resistant to cold.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Constructs are an artificial race, resistant to chemicals, toxicity, sickness, and diseases. they also resist cold.

XenotypeDef.label: Azael
XenotypeDef.description: Azaels are a demonic race from another world, fireproof and deeply magically attuned. they were capable of teleportation where they're from, but their attunement to how the world flows has translated to excellent psychic sensitivity.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Azaels are a demonic race, fireproof and highly psychically sensitive.
